title: Answer
text: The answer is $$x+\frac{3}{5} y+\frac{9}{5} z=\frac{1}{5}$$ $$y+\frac{13}{21} z=-\left(\frac{4}{7}\right)$$ $$z=-\left(\frac{24}{187}\right)$$.

title: Answer
text: Therefore, the answer to the system of equations is $$\frac{61}{187}-\frac{92}{187}-\frac{24}{187}$$.
